korean: 오늘은 우리 사귄 지 1년이 되는 날이다.
선물은 상대방이 좋아할 만한 걸로 골랐어.
저녁에 맛있는 음식 먹고 좋은 시간을 보냈다.
분위기 좋은 레스토랑에서 촛불 켜고 식사했어.
이렇게 소중한 사람을 만나서 정말 행운이야.
오늘이 정말 특별한 날로 기억될 것 같아.
english: Today marks one year since we started dating.
I planned it out a month in advance.
I made a restaurant reservation and prepared a gift.
I chose a gift that my partner would like.
We ate delicious food in the evening and had a great time.
We dined with candles at a restaurant with a nice atmosphere.
My partner really loved the gift.
I also got a gift, and it was honestly really touching.
They wrote me a letter too, and I almost cried while reading it.
I'm really lucky to have met such a precious person.
I hope we stay this happy going forward.
There were tough times, but it was a year we overcame together.
Let's continue to love and cherish each other.
I think today will be remembered as a really special day.
